reviews.text:
A must visit after or before your grocery shopping. Located inside saraga market, it is convenient and offers seating area for dining in. 

Dak gangjeong-...

Got food for to go and it was pretty good.

I ordered spicy pork and Korean Fried Chicken. Both dishes were different from what I used to have.
Spicy pork...
Salmon roll was great, fast service! Little on the pricier side but that typically comes with a good hall.
